page.title: 03INTERVIEW PARISH CHAIRMAN
page.content:
{CALDECOTE,SMALL VILLAGE,CAMBRIDGESHIRE { {INTERVIEW WITH THE CHAIRMAN OF THE {PARISH COUNCIL,}MAURICE CHARLES WILKINS.
{WHERE DO YOU LIVE?} ST ANNES 48 HIGHFIELDS {HOW LONG HAVE YOU LIVED HERE?} 30 YEARS. {HOW DO YOU THINK THE VILLAGE HAS {CHANGED OVER THE YEARS?} BEFORE HE WAS HERE THE REAL VILLAGE OF CALDECOTE WAS DOWN BY ST MICHAELS CHURCH AND THE HOUSES HAVE MOVED DOWN. ABOUT 50 YEARS AGO THE ROAD OUTSIDE THE SCHOOL WAS JUST A GRASS TRACK. AFTER THE GREAT WAR THAT WAS ABOUT 1922 PEOPLE BOUGHT PLOTS OF LAND IN HIGHFIELDS. { { CON'T PAGE 4
